newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Palestinians get life for killing Israeli driver.
newsitem.headline: Palestinians get life for killing Israeli driver.

text.p: A Palestinian security court sentenced two Palestinians to life in jail on Saturday for the murder of an Israeli taxi driver, a court official said.

Jericho security court chief Ummayyad Tahboub said the court sentenced the two men to hard labour for life and a third youth, aged 17, to 15 years in jail for killing the driver, who went missing on Thursday.
